Death Mountain Crater (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

Death Mountain Crater (Rock Grotto).text: They say that #Deku Tree# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Death Mountain Trail (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Training Grounds# is a foolish choice.

Death Mountain Trail (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Desert Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

Gerudo Valley (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found at #Hyrule Field#.

Goron City (Maze).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Goron City (Medigoron).text: They say that #Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

Hyrule Castle (Malon).text: They say that #Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

Hyrule Castle (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Spirit Temple# hoards #a Small Key#.

Hyrule Castle (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

Hyrule Field (Castle Moat Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Hyrule Field (Hammer Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

Hyrule Field (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

Hyrule Field (Rock Grotto).text: They say that #a Small Key# can be found at #Kakariko Village#.

Kakariko (Potion Grotto).text: They say that #Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

Kokiri Forest (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Kakariko Village#.

Kokiri Forest (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Stone of Agony#.

Kokiri Forest (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Kokiri Forest (Storms).text: They say that plundering #Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

Lake Hylia (Lab).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Stone of Agony#.

Lake Hylia (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Small Key#.

Lake Hylia (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

Lost Woods (Bridge).text: They say that #Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Lost Woods (Rock Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Sacred Forest Meadow (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Small Key#.

Sacred Forest Meadow (Maze Upper).text: They say that paying a fee #within Gerudo's Fortress# grants access to #Water Temple#.

Sacred Forest Meadow (Saria).text: They say that in #a frozen fountain#, an opening leads to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

Temple of Time (Left).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

Temple of Time (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

Temple of Time (Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

Temple of Time (Right-Center).text: They say that #Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

Zoras Domain (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Song of Time#.

Zoras Fountain (Fairy).text: They say that #fishing in youth# bestows #a Wallet#.

Zoras Fountain (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Song of Time#.

Zoras River (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.
